title: Copies of the results of all such tests shall be retained by the authority for a period of not less than two year after the acceptance of the alternative material
clause_text: Copies of the results of all such tests shall be retained by the authority for a period of not less than two year after the acceptance of the alternative material.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
